Reviews.Title: “Great value and very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: C S
Reviews.Content: attended solar power conference oct 2011 conference hotels expensive 200day instead opted stay western inn modest little hotel 4 miles convention center cost third paid conference hotels night bit rough close laundry machines manager elizabeth kindly relocated quieter overall stay comfortable clean maintained staff friendly helpful greeting smile summary hotel strongly recommended avoid laundry

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”

Reviews.Content: husband looking stay night attending fair texas fairly close 3 miles rate exhausted spending ten hours fair greeted friendly girl front desk explained grab quick bite traveling hit told highway restaurant parking lot recommended supplied menu bit pricey opted highway pleased king clean inviting bathroom bit fine night weeks stay complaint noise door hung outside chatting huge pickup truck outside door cranked 5am rattled windows lobby breakfast tables dont time breakfast sit overall pleased friendliness staff location cleanliness definitely stay overnight couple night stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for brief business trip”

Reviews.Content: excellent value nights dallas training location perfect 3 miles hospital scored nice bargain aaa king bed plenty roomy little ol sofa little worn clean microwave fridge bathroom tub sink marble didnt pool cant comment pleasantly surprised fast wifi internet breakfast slightly continental fill eggs sausages toast starting day staff excellent card stopped day stay

Reviews.Content: stayed western city dallas overcharged credit card stay 3 weeks manager giving runaround crediting credit card overcharges ive file complaint texas attorney office business bureau refund money definitely recommend staying hotel bad people
